The learning of a student at GPREC is a joyful journey transforming an aspiring young mind to an inspiring engineer, Its definitely a good choice for you

The College is known for its quality initiatives. All the UG courses in the institute are accredited by National Board of Accreditation (NBA) and National Assessment and Accreditation Council (NAAC) with A+ Grade. The college got all India rank 177 by NIRF-2019 rankings.
Academics, Admissions, Placements, Hostels, Sports & What not? You ask, We provide!
Established in 1984-85, it is one of the earliest private engineering colleges in Andhra Pradesh state. GPREC has been functioning as an autonomous institution since 2006.
There are totally six departments in GPREC namely : CSE, ECE, EEE, ME, CE & ECS

The Training and Placement Cell is headed by Dr.B.Veerabhadra Reddy, Professor of Mechanical Engineering. In line with the requirement of industry, the college arranges training for all the students right from the first year of their admission in the college.

patterns: how are placements in this college
responses: So, for 2021 batch - 544 offers (Cognizant-189; TCS-153, Infosys-81, DXC-101; LTTS-10, Hexaware Technologies-9, Virtusa-1) and for 2020 Batch - 600+ offers with an average salary package of Rs. 4.11 Lacs per annum.
Yess! There are two separate hostels available for both boys & girls

patterns: tell me in detail about girls hostel
responses: Hostel accommodation for the B-Tech girl students is available in G.Narayanamma Bhalikala Vasathi Gruham, Kurnool. Girls Hostel Fee per year: Ordinary Room(common bathroom) Rupees-65,500 & Deluxe Room ( AC + attached bathroom) Rupees-75,500

patterns: tell me in detail about boys hostel
responses: Hostel accommodation for the B.Tech boys is available in Boys Hostel, located adjacent to the college campus. Seats will be filled on first-cum-first serve basis. Boys Hostel Fee per year: Ordinary Room (common bathroom)  Rupees-70,500 & Special Room ( attached bathroom) Rupees-75,500
K.Istaq Ahmed sir is the incharge of our boys hostel.

patterns: is there wifi available in college
responses: Yes, our college is wifi enabled campus.

For B-Tech, of the sanctioned intake in a branch of engineering, 70% of the seats are called Category-A seats or Convener seats. The remaining 30% seats are called Category-B seats or Management Quota Seats.

For M-Tech, of the sanctioned intake in a branch of engineering, 70% of the seats are called Category-A seats or Convener seats. The remaining 30% seats are called Category-B seats or Management Quota Seats.

Our college offers state-of-the-art facilities to enhance your learning experience. This includes wifi enabled campus, well-equipped laboratories, lush greenery, a vast library, sports facilities, and comfortable accommodation options. We strive to create an environment that supports both academic and extracurricular activities.

patterns: how much is the btech fee per year?
responses: The Fee Structure for Category-A  Admission Seats is Rupees : 75,000. ( For All Branches). The Fee Structure for Category-B Admission Seats is Rupees : 2,10,000  for CSE, CSB, CSM, CSD & Rupees : 1,75,000 for ECE and  Rupees : 1,00,000 for EEE, MEC, CIV.

patterns: how much rank should I get to get scholarship?
responses: The college offers complete tuition fee waiver for all the four years of the B.Tech course to students who join this college with less than 2000 rank in EAMCET.
Our college has two different shifts - 8:30 AM to 3:30 PM for I & III years and 9:30 AM to 4:30 PM for II & IV years.

patterns: Where can i get bus pass?
where should i get my bus pass from?
responses: You can get your college bus pass from x sir, near R&D Lab, Mechanical Block 2.
The bus will come to their respective stops, 45 mins before the college starts
The bus will come to their respective stops, 45 mins before the college starts
The annual fee for bus pass is Rupees 7500.

patterns: how many different kinds of sports are there?
responses: Our college has seperate sports club and also conducts many competetions on different kinds of sports as well as there will be UDAAN only for sports competetions which will be conducted in every year, from january to february

patterns: is there a stadium in gprec?
responses: Yes! There is an indoor stadium available in our campus with well facilitated court for badminton.
